Class DataModelProvider<M extends DataModel<P>,P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pengyr.tool.core.data.DataProvider<P>

  • public class DataModelProvider<M extends DataModel<P>,P>
extends DataProvider<P>
    to keep change data for adapter

    only refresh data when adapter is on main ui thread

    Created by Peng on 2017/6/13.
